item.title: Tab is a Tab is a Tab is a Tab
item.description:
Well I’m a big fan of “tabs” and feel much more comfortable when launching everything into tabs: web pages, text files, PDF files, Windows Office files (Word, Excel, PPT), and even folders.  Followings are my best of choices to share: 1. File Explorer: Clover http://ejie.me/
There are lots of fancy/complicated file/folder management system beyond Windows Explore (Total Commander might be the most famous one) while Clover, as its name indicates, is just as simple as I need:
